cause.description:
if you masterbait more than 2 times a week! you need help.. and we are here for you, help us raise money for those poor bastards that can't get any, find prostites, this is a non profit organisation that helps horny little herpy blisters get layed, and keep getting layed, so that they could kick there masterbation addiction. So please donate generously..
for only a dollar a day.. you could sponser a masterbation junky, and change a poor bastard life forever..
masterbation is an addiction and it can be fought, So donate generously
